title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining user interfaces for our web applications.
requirements: Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with React.js or similar frontend frameworks
Good understanding of responsive design principles
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills
responsibilities: Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
whoYouAre: Passionate about building great user experiences
Attention to detail and a good eye for aesthetics
Team player with good communication skills
niceToHave: Familiarity with CSS preprocessors like Sass or LESS
Experience with unit and integration testing

title: Backend Developer
description: Join our Backend Development team and work on creating robust and scalable server-side applications. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement backend solutions.
responsibilities: Write clean and maintainable code for our backend services
Create database schemas that represent and support business processes
Implement security and data protection measures
Integrate user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server-side logic
whoYouAre: You have a passion for coding and creating efficient backend systems
A team player who can also work independently
You have an analytical mind with problem-solving aptitude
niceToHave: Experience with cloud services like AWS, GCP, or Azure
Familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes
requirements: Proficient in server-side languages such as Node.js, Python, or Java
Experience with database management systems (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB)
Understanding of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git)

title: UX Designer
description: We are looking for a talented UX Designer to create amazing user experiences. The ideal candidate should have an eye for clean and artful design and possess superior UX skills.
responsibilities: Collaborate with product management and engineering to define and implement innovative solutions for product direction, visuals, and experience
Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off to engineering
Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user-friendliness to complex design roadblocks
whoYouAre: Creative thinker with a vision
Attention to detail and a strong sense of aesthetics and design principles
Ability to work methodically and meet deadlines
niceToHave: Experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows, and site maps
Knowledge in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for rapid prototyping
requirements: Strong portfolio of design projects
Background in project management and research
Familiarity with interaction design and information architecture
Proficient in design software (e.g., Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD)

title: Product Manager
description: We are looking for a Product Manager to join our growing team. You will work closely with our engineering and design teams to guide products from conception to launch.
responsibilities: Develop product roadmaps and define product vision and strategy
Work with cross-functional teams to deliver quality products on time
Analyze market trends and define product metrics to measure success
whoYouAre: Strategic thinker with strong leadership skills
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Driven and results-oriented with a customer-first mindset
niceToHave: Technical background with knowledge of software development processes
Experience with product lifecycle management
requirements: Proven experience in product management or as an associate product manager
Background in software development and program management is a plus
Familiarity with Agile framework
Organizational and leadership abilities

title: Data Scientist
description: We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our team. You will be responsible for developing statistical learning models for data analysis and conducting tests and experiments.
responsibilities: Analyze large, complex datasets to extract insights and decide on the appropriate techniques
Develop predictive models and machine learning algorithms
Present information using data visualization techniques
Collaborate with engineering and product development teams
whoYouAre: You are analytical and enjoy extracting stories from data
You are curious and driven by the desire to solve complex data problems
You have a collaborative mindset and are eager to share findings with your team
niceToHave: Experience in deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or Keras
Publications or presentations in recognized Machine Learning and Data Science communities
requirements: Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, SQL, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets
Experience working with and creating data architectures
Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications
Experience analyzing data from 3rd party providers: Google Analytics, Site Catalyst, Coremetrics, Adwords, Crimson Hexagon, Facebook Insights, etc.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for implementing and managing our CI/CD pipeline and ensuring that all systems are working properly.
responsibilities: Build and set up new development tools and infrastructure
Work on ways to automate and improve development and release processes
Ensure that systems are safe and secure against cybersecurity threats
Identify technical problems and develop software updates and ‘fixes’
whoYouAre: You are a problem solver and a team player
You have a keen interest in network and system security
You possess a strong sense of ownership and take pride in the infrastructure you build
niceToHave: Experience with monitoring systems
Experience with Kafka or other streaming data platforms
requirements: Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, CircleCI)
Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)
Experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)
Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation)

title: QA Engineer
description: We are looking for a QA Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for testing and debugging our web and mobile applications to ensure that they meet our high standards.
responsibilities: Develop and execute test plans to ensure the best software quality
Automate tests using tools and scripts
Work with development teams to fix bugs and follow up on resolutions
Ensure that every phase and feature of the software solution is tested
whoYouAre: Detail-oriented and passionate about product quality
A team player who can communicate effectively with technical and non-technical teams
Able to handle multiple tasks simultaneously
niceToHave: Knowledge of performance and security testing
Experience with continuous integration and deployment
requirements: Experience with QA tools (e.g., Selenium, Postman)
Experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha)
Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, CircleCI)
Experience with bug tracking tools (e.g., Jira, Trello)

title: Software Engineer
description: We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing and developing scalable and robust applications using the latest web technologies.
responsibilities: Write clean, maintainable and efficient code
Design robust, scalable and secure features
Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle
Follow best practices (test-driven development, continuous integration, SCRUM, refactoring and code standards)
whoYouAre: You are a skilled software engineer who is proficient in a broad range of software design approaches and common UX patterns
You can discern user requirements and develop specifications
You are keen to learn, able to adapt and perfect your work
niceToHave: Experience with cloud-native development
Background in DevOps and cloud deployments
requirements: Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with a JavaScript framework (e.g., React.js, Vue.js, Angular)
Experience with a backend language (e.g., Node.js, Python, Java)
Experience with a database management system (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB)

title: UX Designer
description: We are looking for a talented UX Designer to create amazing user experiences. The ideal candidate should have an eye for clean and artful design and possess superior UX skills.
responsibilities: Create wireframes, prototypes, and user flows to effectively communicate design ideas
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and evaluate user requirements
Conduct user research and usability testing to iterate and improve designs
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in UX design
whoYouAre: You have a passion for understanding user behaviors and crafting user-centric interfaces
You are creative and have a strong problem-solving mindset
You are collaborative and communicate your design decisions effectively
niceToHave: Experience in designing for mobile platforms
Understanding of basic front-end languages: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
requirements: Strong portfolio of design projects
Background in project management and research
Familiarity with interaction design and information architecture
Proficient in design software (e.g., Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD)

title: Product Manager
description: We are looking for a Product Manager to join our growing team. You will work closely with our engineering and design teams to guide products from conception to launch.
responsibilities: Define the product vision, strategy, and roadmap
Gather and prioritize product and customer requirements
Work closely with engineering teams to deliver quick time-to-market products
Run beta and pilot programs with early-stage products and samples
whoYouAre: A visionary with a deep understanding of customer needs
Excellent leadership skills and the ability to work closely with different teams
Strategic thinker with an ability to make complex decisions based on both data and intuition
niceToHave: Experience with SaaS products
Certification in Product Management
requirements: Proven experience in product management or as an associate product manager
Background in software development and program management is a plus
Familiarity with Agile framework
Organizational and leadership abilities

title: Data Scientist
description: We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our team. You will be responsible for developing statistical learning models for data analysis and conducting tests and experiments.
responsibilities: Use predictive modeling to increase and optimize customer experiences, revenue generation, ad targeting, and other business outcomes
Develop company A/B testing framework and test model quality
Coordinate with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes
Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy
whoYouAre: You have strong problem-solving skills with an emphasis on product development
You are data-driven and comfortable with large data sets
You have strong communication skills and the ability to explain complex analyses in layman's terms
niceToHave: Experience with distributed data/computing tools: Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Gurobi, MySQL, etc.
Experience with natural language processing, machine learning, and conceptual modelling
requirements: Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, SQL, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets
Experience working with and creating data architectures
Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications
Experience analyzing data from 3rd party providers: Google Analytics, Site Catalyst, Coremetrics, Adwords, Crimson Hexagon, Facebook Insights, etc.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Join our DevOps team and contribute to the development and maintenance of our infrastructure. You will play a key role in ensuring the reliability and scalability of our systems.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain CI/CD pipeline to automate processes
Implement and manage cloud-based infrastructure
Work with containerization technologies for deployment
Ensure security and efficiency of infrastructure
whoYouAre: Problem-solver with a focus on efficiency and scalability
Keen on automation and improving development processes
Adept in working in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
niceToHave: Experience in managing large-scale infrastructure
Certification in cloud services and DevOps tools
requirements: Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, CircleCI)
Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)
Experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)
Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation)

title: QA Engineer
description: We are seeking a QA Engineer to ensure the quality of our software products. Collaborate with development teams to implement effective testing strategies and maintain high-quality standards.
responsibilities: Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open-source tools
Identify, record, document thoroughly, and track bugs
Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved
Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products
whoYouAre: Detail-oriented with a passion for software quality
Team player who excels in a collaborative environment
Proactive and keen to learn new technologies and tools
niceToHave: Experience with performance and/or security testing
Knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes
requirements: Experience with QA tools (e.g., Selenium, Postman)
Experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha)
Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, CircleCI)
Experience with bug tracking tools (e.g., Jira, Trello)

title: Social Media Assistant
description: Stripe is seeking a Social Media Assistant to manage our online presence. You will be responsible for monitoring social media channels, creating engaging content, and driving community interaction.
responsibilities: Manage and update social media profiles and presence, including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and additional channels
Create and curate engaging content for social media platforms
Monitor and report on feedback and online reviews
Coordinate with Marketing, PR, and Communications teams
whoYouAre: Creative thinker with a passion for digital communication
Strong understanding of the latest trends in social media
Self-motivated with the ability to work in a fast-paced environment
niceToHave: Graphic design skills and familiarity with design software
Experience with social media analytics tools
requirements: Proven experience with social media platforms, including Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram
Ability to create engaging content that resonates with our audience
Understanding of social media metrics and how to interpret them to improve strategy
Excellent communication skills and ability to interact with a diverse online community

title: Content Writer
description: Stripe is seeking a Content Writer to join our Marketing team. You will be responsible for creating and publishing engaging content to drive brand awareness and generate leads.
responsibilities: Create and publish engaging content for our website and social media platforms
Collaborate with Marketing and Design teams to plan and develop site content
Conduct keyword research and use SEO guidelines to optimize content
Proofread and edit blog posts before publication
whoYouAre: Creative thinker with a passion for writing
Strong research skills and attention to detail
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
niceToHave: Experience with content management systems (e.g., WordPress)
Basic understanding of HTML and web publishing
requirements: Proven experience as a content writer or similar role
Portfolio of published articles
Excellent writing and editing skills
Basic understanding of SEO and web traffic metrics

title: Graphic Designer
description: Stripe is seeking a Graphic Designer to join our Marketing team. You will be responsible for creating visual concepts to communicate ideas that inspire, inform, and captivate our audience.
responsibilities: Develop concepts, graphics, and layouts for product illustrations, company logos, and websites
Collaborate with Marketing and Design teams to create engaging designs
Use the appropriate colors and layouts for each graphic
Work with copywriters and creative director to produce final design
whoYouAre: Creative thinker with a strong visual sense
Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate with different teams
Ability to work methodically and meet deadlines
niceToHave: Experience with design software and technologies (e.g., InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop)
Knowledge of HTML and CSS
requirements: Proven graphic designing experience
A strong portfolio of illustrations or other graphics
Familiarity with design software and technologies (such as InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop)
A keen eye for aesthetics and details

responsibilities: Develop and maintain design wireframes, mockups, and specifications
Collaborate with product management and engineering to define and implement innovative solutions for product direction, visuals, and experience
Conduct user research and usability testing to iterate and improve designs
Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders

niceToHave: Experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows, and site maps

Strong portfolio of design projects

Familiarity with interaction design and information architecture
